description: Oksana has an emotionally charged exchange with a confidant who shares the devastation of BCI errors, strengthening her resolve toward a reckoning.
She bypasses protocol using her analyst clearance, securely transferring 'The Ledger' data to an Innovator-aligned news group.
A group linked to the Innovators publishes 'The Ledger,' exposing thousands of wrongful BCI sanctions and disappearances from 2022 onward.
